Overview¶

Table of contents

  • Status Panel
  • Switching Pages
  • Application Menu

MxDC (Macromolecular Crystallography Data Collector) is a software package for acquisition of Macromolecular Crystallography data and related techniques at synchrotron beamlines.

The MxDC user interface is organized into pages, each focused on a specific type of activity, and a status bar which is visible on every page and provides overall status information and commands.

Status Panel¶
